column4: what program do you guys use for torrents, do you guys use ktorrent or rtorrent  ?    if you want a program to run in a background without a user logged in, then you can use rtorrent, right?
ktorrent is like utorrent too, but i am looking for something that will run in the background , like a deamon,   i think rtorrent is the only one that supports that because you can run it in screen
